name: Slime Overrun
description:
Play as Slimes and crawl through dungeons while having your revenge on greedy heroes!

Controls: Play with the buttons on screen using your mouse, or the WASD keys.

In this project we created a puzzle based dungeon game, with the core mechanic of having your slimes working together (even knowing how hard that can be), find and destroy the Warriors at the end of each level to progress!

This game was developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 during the timeframe of a week.

Player feedback and suggestions would be appreciated, and welcome.

Developers: 

Gabriel LF as Programmer and Level Designer
Henrikilis as Programmer and Game Designer
Di Exploitation as Art Director and Tech Artist
lelmuertol as UI Artist and Character Designer
Gustavo Peres Cera as Sound Designer and Composer

We are planning to keep supporting the game on the future!
